text: Proud to share my @newscientist article, which explores the need for informed consent, trust-building and #intercultural planning for #COVID19 #vaccine  rollout within #IndigenousPeoples communities. @SinergiasAE @gaiaamazonas @AmazonTeamOrg  @ApibOficial @fiocruz @catdl https://t.co/echoRvXaPi
